settings.description: Hand Made Style Designer Furniture from around the world come together at Mobelaris, bringing you a vast range of designer furniture, lighting and accessories at a fraction of the high street price.

settings.title: Bildglas
settings.text: Berätta för ditt varumärkes historia via video och bilder
settings.back_in_stock_text: Maila mig när det här är tillgängligt
settings.leading_time_description: All items are dispatched within 2-5 working days. Some European dispatch times may be longer due to processing/admin. Any quantity of items that are not in stock or clearly displayed as due into stock with a certain date will be manufactured to order, please allow 12 - 18 weeks for these.
settings.outstock_leading_time_description: Upon ordering your items will be handcrafted especially for you. This takes time and expertise so we allow 4 -5 weeks for manufacture, quality assurance and packaging. 4 weeks travel to the U.K., and then there’s customs clearance and admin. It’s worth the wait!
settings.upsell_leading_time_description: The dates given are approximate, given to us by our shippers. This does not take into account, customs clearance, decanting of containers, labeling, organisation, and distribution from our UK warehouse.

settings.content:
30 DAY

GUARANTEE

No quibbles money back

settings.heading:
No Extra Taxes / Duty

Guaranteed
settings.pop_text: We now send out items where the customer is not liable for import tax or duty (not inc Norway or Switzerland) through courier network DDP (Delivery Duty Paid) This is a delivery agreement between ourselves and the courier companies, where we are obliged by contract to pay all duties and tax on import rather than the customer. This DOES NOT include Norway or Switzerland. This is easily arranged through the courier and directly with the customer for these 2 countries.

settings.heading:
RETURNS

30-Day Returns
settings.pop_text: We offer cost effective 30-day returns to customers in most of Europe. We created this policy as part of our ongoing effort to provide a hassle-free shopping experience, enabling you to transform your living space into your own personal showroom, and try your favourite design in the comfort of your own home before making a long-term commitment.

settings.heading:
WARRANTY

5 Years Warranty
settings.pop_text: One of the reasons you might be shopping with us is that you recognise the superior quality of our pieces. And just as we want our furniture to be the best you can find, we want our promise to you to be equally superior. That’s why, while most furniture manufacturers only offer a 1 year warranty, we offer a 5 year warranty. Please go to to read the full warranty policy.

settings.title: Do you have feedback from existing customers?
settings.answer: We sure do! We’ve given thousands of customers the style they’ve wanted at the price they’ve wanted. Want to see what a few of them have had to say? Head over to our reviews to see their words yourself.

settings.title: Do you have a warranty?
settings.answer: One of the reasons you might be shopping with us is that you recognise the superior quality of our pieces. And just as we want our furniture to be the best you can find, we want our promise to you to be equally superior. That’s why, while most furniture manufacturers only offer a 2 year warranty, we offer a 5 year warranty.

settings.title: Do you have any showrooms where I can see the furniture?
settings.answer:
We are online only.
Decades after the deaths of the renowned designers, the prices are high, making them available only to the wealthy - Here at Mobelaris we offer affordable designer furniture for all. Therefore, We Created an Alternative -> Out of frustration, we created an alternative by eliminating middle men, sales staff and expensive showrooms.  We take this savings and pass them on to our customers, therefore offering the great quality product at a great price.

settings.title: How can I be assured in quality?
settings.answer:
From the supply chain to production to the moment it arrived in our warehouse, the product has been also quality checked and tested at several stages.
Once production is complete, we inspect your piece(s) scrupulously one last time before initiating shipment.

settings.title: Is Covid-19 impacting your deliveries?
settings.answer: No, we are delivering as usual. As we navigate this uncertain time, we want you to know we’re doing all we can to keep our staff and customers safe. Desiger Icons is open, and we’re delivering as usual. We’ve put new measures in place to keep our warehouse staff safe, including heightened hygiene processes, split shifts and social distancing, and we’ve introduced no-contact delivery.

settings.title: How will my delivery be arranged?
settings.answer: Once your product is ready for delivery to your shipping address, you will be contacted by the carrier to advise the days on which they will deliver to your area and to work out when it is most suitable for you. Please note for larger items you will be delivered at street level.

settings.heading: Join our mailing list
settings.newsletter_subheading: Get new products and promotions in your inbox. We’re not clingy, you can unsubscribe at any time.

settings.rt_text: We exist to make mid-century designer furniture accessible to all once again.

Great designer furniture pieces shouldn't be decorations only for the wealthy. Designer pieces don't belong solely in galleries and design museums gathering dust. Nearly a decade ago, we brought together a team frustrated by high designer furniture prices, intent on creating affordable alternatives.

settings.iwt_text: Mid-century furniture that were created over 60 years ago should to be accessible to all. Decades after the deaths of the renowned designers, the prices are high, making them available only to the wealthy - Here at Mobelaris we offer affordable designer furniture for all

Out of frustration, we created an alternative by eliminating middle men, sales staff and expensive showrooms. We began producing all products in our own factory and making these designs widely available and affordable once again. In addition, we decided to offer fast shipping, 30-day returns and a 5-year warranty on all of our products, to take the hassle out of furniture buying.

By combining highly skilled labor and technological innovations, we’ve streamlined the production and quality assurance processes, resulting in faster, more precise service. Our artisans follow stringent quality assurance standards from the instant production begins to the moment your order leaves our factory. Every Desiger Editions design is triple checked for precision to ensure you receive a perfect piece of designer furniture every time you place an order.

By sourcing only from the very best factories, we’re able to keep prices low and maintain stringent quality control. Our strict policies on outsourcing is one of the key reasons we’re able to offer a 5-year warranty on every product we offer.

Learn more

Our factory-to-home business model allows us to pass a substantial savings onto you. Your satisfaction is our highest priority, so once production is complete, we inspect your piece(s) scrupulously one last time before initiating shipment. Our hope is that you’ll fall in love with your new furniture the moment it arrives at your door.

settings.rt_text: Where we make it possible for everyone to own designer quality

settings.code:
<video width="100%" class="w-100" muted="" loop="" autoplay="" playsinline="">
      <source src="/files/1/2589/1828/files/interior-icons-factory.webm?26956" type="video/webm">

settings.iwt_text: At Desiger Icons, we take pride in our family-like atmosphere. We value our staff, and we’re intent on providing fair, competitive wages. Through open communication and constant collaboration, we make every effort to maintain a wonderful working environment. Our artisans are professionally trained to ensure the highest quality throughout the design and construction process, so you can always order with confidence. We believe that building and maintaining trusting relationships is essential, whether those relationships are with our longtime suppliers, our staff, or you—our valued customer.

All of our skilled artisans are intent on crafting each piece of furniture in the best possible quality, utilizing high-quality materials and construction processes to ensure each and every item lives up to your expectations when it’s delivered to your door.

Aside from providing an excellent customer experience, we believe there’s nothing more important than consistently offering high-quality furniture you can count on. Every Desiger Icons design is triple checked for precision to ensure you receive a perfect piece of designer furniture every time you place an order. By combining highly skilled labor and technological innovations, we’ve streamlined the production and quality assurance processes, resulting in faster, more precise service. Our artisans follow stringent quality assurance standards from the instant production begins to the moment your order leaves our factory.

settings.rt_text:
We have 100's of happy customers! Meet a few of them below, and click here to read their glowing reviews.

Each and every time one of our customers purchases an Desiger Icons piece, we get excited. Why? Because they’re one step closer to creating some iconic interiors of their own! Get inspired by a few of our customers’ inspirational interiors.

That’s why, while most furniture manufacturers only offer a 1 year warranty, we offer a 5 year warranty. Please go to warranty policy to read the full warranty policy.

settings.title: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
settings.answer: Our reproduction Cushion for Wishbone Chair is reversible, requires low maintenance and resistant to most stains and fading. Available in easy to pair up colors of Black, White, Tan, Mocha and Beige.

settings.heading: Shop Instagram - Less than humble about your abode?
MOST SEARCHED
settings.content: At Mobelaris we try to bring you all of the best style designer furniture from the UK including 1920's to inspired by modern pieces of today.

settings.heading: FAVORITE DINING CHAIRS
settings.content: Style Mid Century Designer Dining from Oak to Fibreglass, Verner Panton to Hans J Wegner, to name but a few.

settings.heading: DESIGNER LIGHTING
settings.content: Style Mid Century Designer Lighting such as Artichoke Light, Verner Panton Globe Pendant, are a few of the beautiful collections that Mobelaris offer.

settings.heading: BEST SELLERS
settings.content: Top picks decided by you the customer, usually in stock and to dispach with in 72 hours, European favourites to your door.

settings.heading: Bauhaus Furniture
settings.content: If you want functional, simplistic designs to decorate your space, our selection of Bauhaus Furniture is perfect for you.

settings.heading: Industrial Furniture
settings.content: Mobelaris has an array of modern and vintage industrial furniture that will beautifully transform your living or working space.

settings.heading: Office Furniture
settings.content: Elegant, quality and affordable pieces of high-quality replicas of designer items that your home or office deserves.

settings.heading: CH23 Chairs
settings.content: The CH23 Chair, a wooden dining chair with paper cord seat, it has been the best seller since it was released.

settings.heading: Noguchi Coffee Tables
settings.content: A triumph of minimalist design that combines natural and man-made materials for a stunning effect.

settings.heading: Artichoke Lamps
settings.content: Our replica of the Artichoke Lamp portrays the classic feel of the early 60’s because of its luxurious design.

settings.heading: Togo Style Sofa
settings.content: This cult classic features its recognizable curved outline and pleated fabric design, perfect to lay back and relax.

settings.heading: Wishbone (Y) Chair - CH24
settings.content: Captures the quintessential Danish mid-century modern design. Truly a unique piece to elevate any space.

settings.heading: Camaleonda Style Sofa
settings.content: This masterpiece is built for comfort. Nothing suggest relaxation and mellowed vibe more than this unique chair.

settings.heading: SEARCH BY GENRE
settings.content: Rustic Moderm, Bauhaus, Mid Century or colourful 70's style, Mobelaris have a broad range of designs to fullfill all aspirations.

settings.manufacturer_text:
We only choose the highest quality factories from around the globe to manufacture your products.

Most of our factories have a heritage of manufacturing dating back 20+ years.

Working closely with these factories over the past 15 years has given us price and lead time advantages, which we then pass on to you our customer.

Meet the team brand we work with is required.
settings.contact_text: Join us a note and we’ll get back to you as quickly as possible.
